ch.unizh.ori.nabu.voc
Class VocabularyConfigurator

java.lang.Object
  ch.unizh.ori.nabu.voc.VocabularyConfigurator

public class VocabularyConfigurator
extends java.lang.Object

Class VocabularyConfigurator is a helper class to turn the configuration given by a tutor into the XML needed.

Author:
pht

Method Detail

export

public static org.w3c.dom.Document export(java.util.Properties vars,
                                          java.lang.String separator)
                                   throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                          java.io.IOException
Turns the data given by a tutor into the appropriate XML-Description. It parses "columns" and "modes" from vars and parses it using readTable with parameter separator.

Parameters:
vars - contains the parameters like name, description, id, encoding etc.
separator - contains the separator to get columns and modes from the properties.
Returns:
A DOM-Document which can be loaded as a Vocabulary, or saved for later use.
Throws:
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
java.io.IOException

export

public static org.w3c.dom.Document export(java.util.Properties vars,
                                          java.util.List columns,
                                          java.util.List modesList)
                                   throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
Deprecated. Use export(SimpleVocabularyConfiguration) instead

Turns the data given by a tutor into the appropriate XML-Description.

Parameters:
vars - contains the parameters like name, description, id, encoding etc.
columns - a List of String[]s that encode the columns id, name, script and delimiters, where the last one or the last two are facultative.
modes - contains a List of String[]s that encode the modes id, short, and facultatively name.
Returns:
A DOM-Document which can be loaded as a Vocabulary, or saved for later use.
Throws:
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
